tool_description: API to search relevant blogs based on keywords/tags and add medium Blogs to your Website.
name: medium-api
title: medium-api

api_list.name: getTags
api_list.description: Gives names of Popular Tags on Medium.com
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://medium-api11.p.rapidapi.com/tags"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "medium-api11.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://medium-api11.p.rapidapi.com/tags"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "medium-api11.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
